reviewText:
This Windows 7 Basics instructional program picks up where Windows 7 Basics - Part 1 left off.

Still designed and created for 'computer shy' adult learners who can barely turn a computer on, the topics here are a bit more advanced than those covered in Part 1.

HD recordings, colorful graphics and easy to follow step-by-step instructions are used to get the viewer comfortable with using a Windows 7 computer.

Oh, and there's some peaceful background music too.
